RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_DETAIL.CUSTOMER_NO = TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_COMP.CUSTOMER_NO AND TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_DETAIL.REFUND_NO = TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_COMP.REFUND_NO AND TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_DETAIL.CURRENCY = TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_COMP.CURRENCY AND TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_DETAIL.PARTICIPANT_REF_NO = TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_COMP.PARTICIPANT_REF_NO AND TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_DETAIL.BORROWER_CONTRACT_REF_NO = TXTBS_INVESTOR_REFUND_COMP.BORROWER_CONTRACT_REF_NO

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT m.customer_no,customer_name1 FROM oltms_customer m WHERE customer_no IN (SELECT b.counterparty FROM txtbs_txnrule_detail a,oltbs_contract b WHERE a.contract_ref_no = b.contract_ref_no AND b.counterparty = m.customer_no AND a.event_seq_no = (SELECT max(event_seq_no) FROM txtbs_txnrule_detail x WHERE a.contract_ref_no =x.contract_ref_no) AND a.status = 'N' AND (a.amount - NVL(a.tax_refund_amount,0) - NVL(a.remittance_amount,0)) > 0 AND rownum=1)
